enumtype.name: org.rapidbeans.rapidenv.CmdRenvCommand
enumtype.description: Valid command argument for the "renv" command line tool

enum.name: boot
enum.description: boot the environment. This command usually is issued automatically if the environment is not yet set up.

enum.name: config
enum.description: update configuration(s) of the given installation unit(s)

enum.name: deinstall
enum.description: uninstall the given installation unit(s) if installed

enum.name: hashvalue
enum.description: print the hash value of the given file using the given hash algorithm

enum.name: install
enum.description: install the given installation unit(s) if not installed

enum.name: stat
enum.description: print the installation and configuration status of the given installation unit(s)

enum.name: update
enum.description: update version(s) and configuration(s) of the given installation unit(s)
